name: Worker Communication Hub
description: Worker communication hub for announcements, messages, and notifications

prd.problem: Communication with individual workers about schedules, policies, performance, and administrative matters happens across multiple channels (text, email, in-person) with no centralized record, making it difficult to track what was communicated and when.
prd.solution: Create a worker-specific communication hub where superintendents and managers can send messages, share documents, post announcements, and require acknowledgment of important information. All communications are logged and searchable for reference.
successCriteria: Send direct messages to individual workers
Share documents with specific workers or groups
assumptions: Workers have mobile access or can access system
dependencies: Mobile app or responsive web interface
risks: Workers may not check messages regularly
